content.title: Innovative Dental™ Solutions Since 2009
content.subTitle: WE ARE Innovative Dental
content.para: With two decades of excellence, we are proud to be not just the best but also the largest dental clinic in Bangalore!

content.title: More than 20000+
content.subTitle: Achieving Success in Cosmetic and Implant Cases!
content.para: We offer specialized courses to train doctors in dental implant procedures.

content.title: Among the Best in the Industry
content.subTitle: An Award-Winning Dental Care Provider
content.para: A Leading Hospital in Bangalore with a 5-Star Customer Satisfaction Rating

content.title: Bangalore's Leading Award-Winning Dental Clinic.
paragraphs: Innovative Dental Solutions embodies the ethos of being customer-friendly, cost-effective, and comprehensive in delivering exceptional dental care.
With over 10,000 successful cosmetic and implant cases completed over the past decade, we have proudly established ourselves as one of the best dental clinics in Bangalore.

Our treatments are provided by highly specialized MDS doctors in a fully sterilized environment. With completely transparent treatment charges, you can walk into our clinic with confidence and peace of mind at any time.

ARS Innovative Dental Solutions has been independently assessed and accredited by the Indian Health Organization (IHO). We adhere to the principles and practices of clinical governance as defined by the IHO, ensuring the highest standards of quality and care.

whyUs.title: Why Us
description: We have a state-of-the-art dental clinic in Koramangala at par with International Standards.
Highly qualified dentists with many years of experience are happy to assist you in the most professional manner.

whyDetails.title: Experienced Dentists
whyDetails.description: We have a team of experienced dentists who constantly upgrade and update their skills

whyDetails.title: Gennext Equipment
whyDetails.description: We have updated ourselves with the new generation technology to provide the best in dentistry

whyDetails.title: Sterilization
whyDetails.description: We use latest sterilisation protocol to match with the international standards

whyDetails.title: Success Rate
whyDetails.description: We have completed more than 10000 Successful Cosmetic and Implant Cases

leadership.title: Leadership
leadership.description: We value the power of diversity, bringing together individuals with unique skills, perspectives, and ideas to foster creativity and innovation.
